entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor breaking change in 7.0.302 SDK? #48267
  • Update Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.Features nuget package #48266
  • MSAL on Blazor WebAssembly refresh token expiration invalid_grant regression #48264
  • Random slow response time when application low load #48262
  • EmailAddress data annotation should be able to validate emails without needing extra regex. #48260
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudGetProductDetails #48255
  • Virtualize ItemsProvider work incorrectly and causes blink #48254
    Backlog

Closed

  • Support binding from types defined with an `AsParameters` attribute #46336
    8.0-preview5
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudDeleteProduct #48232
  • Minimal API - improve Parameter Binding, allow validation of query parameters #48261
  • we can't upload the directory(folder) in InputFile component #48257
  • Add generic versions of attributes in ASP.NET Core #37767
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Support metadata generation in RequestDelegate generator #46277
    8.0-preview5
  • API Proposal RoutingStateProvider; RouteData breaking change #47854
    8.0-preview5
  • Uncaught (in promise) Error: Found malformed component comment at Blazor: #48123
  • Perf improvement: mapaction, single_query #48160
  • Perf regression: plainTextSansFilter #48245
  • Review use of null suppression operator in RDG #47771
    8.0-preview5
  • Build error when using RDG with a route handler that returns a type explicitly implementing IResult #47462
    8.0-preview5

PullRequests

Created

  • Ship Microsoft.AspNetCore.WebUtilities, Microsoft.Net.Http.Headers as packages #48265
    area-infrastructure, area-runtime
  • Update CredScanSuppressions.json after DataProtection move #48263
    area-infrastructure
  • DOM merging #48258
    area-blazor
  • Print exit code when trim test fails #48253
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Remove rules associated with the auto-merge label #48227
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview5
  • Add generic variants of MVC attributes #47075
    area-mvc, 8.0-preview5
  • Change namespace for `RootComponentMetadata` and `ComponentTypeMetadata` #48256
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview5
  • Allow declaring render modes, and emit the corresponding markers into HTML #48190
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview5
  • Add support for IResults with explicit interface implementations #48250
    area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview5

Updated

  • Avoid delegate shuffle thunks in StringUtilities #48234
    area-runtime
  • Add IHttpSysRequestTimingFeature to support accessing http.sys timing info #48218
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Skip counter measurement when start listening while processing #48045
    area-runtime, area-signalr
  • Load configuration in UseHttps #48138
    area-runtime
  • Improve endpoint metadata debugging #48207
    area-runtime
  • Replace ISystemClock with TimeProvider in Kestrel #48081
    area-runtime, servers-kestrel, 8.0-preview5
  • Add dependency injection support for object pools #48217
    area-runtime
  • Updated the AddPolicyRegistry extension methods to use TryAdd and TryAddEnumerable internally #47821
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Update SDK #48252
    area-infrastructure
